entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHEAST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
BREEZY AND NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH 15 TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH HEAVY RAINFALL IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY AND NOT AS COOL
MORE HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 20 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH HEAVY RAINFALL IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
